title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Biometric Collection Program

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to enable Bahrains maritime forces to collect biometric data in order to improve the countrys ability to identify, report, share, and record the movement of transnational terrorists in collaboration with the USG. Equipment provided includes biometric data collection devices.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Bahrain Defense Force Royal Guard Special Forces Counterterrorism Training - Phase 1

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).
